definition:
If $\mathcal{NC}$ is a complexity class associated with
non-deterministic machines then
$\mathcal{\#C}=\{\#R\mid R\in\mathcal{NC}\}$ is the set of counting
problems associated with each search problem in $\mathcal{NC}$. In
particular, $\mathcal{\#P}$ is the class of counting problems associated
with $\mathcal{NP}$ search problems.
